## buildMetricValueEvaluator() function

Convert metric style property to expression that accounts \[\[MapView.pixelToWorld\]\] if `metricUnit === 'Pixel'`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function buildMetricValueEvaluator(value: Expr | Value | undefined, metricUnit: string | undefined): string | number | boolean | object | null | undefined;
```
